title: Provides for annual school lead-copper tap water testing; publishing of reports of contamination and abatement of such contamination
summary: Provides for annual school lead-copper tap water testing; requires the publishing of reports of contamination and abatement of such contamination; requires school districts to provide potable water to school children attending affected schools; exempts those schools built without use of lead piping and those schools where a finding of no contamination has been made for three consecutive years.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the education law, in relation to the water dispensed within public schools
